name: Aleksey Kondrakov
title: Developer of games and web applications
description: I am studying C# and Unity, and have completed courses in Unity development. I have participated in competitions such as Cyberfest and Start the Game. I have basic skills in Spine 2D, 2D design and animation, as well as in Level Design and C# WPF. I am also studying HTML, CSS, and React.js to expand my development skills.
